com.receiver2d.engine

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.Scene

  • public class Scene
extends Object
    A particular scene within a world, containing a list of entities and other attributes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected EntityList entityList 
      protected ArrayList<R2DResource> resources 
      Skybox skybox
      The Skybox of the Scene.
      protected HashMap<String,Object> values 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scene(String name)
      Loads a scene into memory and gives it a name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResource(R2DResource res)
      Adds a resource to be loaded when the scene is loaded.

      Gets the list of entities that are attached to this scene.

      Gets the current name of the scene.

      Gets the currently loaded/unloaded resources in the scene.

      Gets a specific scene-based variable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scene

        public Scene(String name)
        Loads a scene into memory and gives it a name.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets the current name of the scene.
        Returns:
        The name of the scene.

      • setEntityList

        public void setEntityList(EntityList entityList)
        Sets the current entity list of the scene to whatever is provided.
        Parameters:
        entityList - An EntityList, containing entities.

      • getEntityList

        public EntityList getEntityList()
        Gets the list of entities that are attached to this scene.
        Returns:
        A list of entities.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(String variable,
            Object value)
        Sets a variable for a particular scene.
        Parameters:
        variable - The name of the variable.
        value - The value of the variable.

      • getValue

        public Object getValue(String variable)
        Gets a specific scene-based variable. Very useful for having variables that only correspond to one type of scene in a game.
        Parameters:
        variable - The name of the stored variable.
        Returns:
        A found value, or null if no variable can be found.

      • addResource

        public void addResource(R2DResource res)
        Adds a resource to be loaded when the scene is loaded.
        Parameters:
        res - The resource to add.

      • getResources

        public ArrayList<R2DResource> getResources()
        Gets the currently loaded/unloaded resources in the scene.
        Returns:
        The list of resources.
